org.treetank.io

Interface IBackendReader

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    IBackendWriter
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    BackendWriterProxy, BerkeleyReader, BerkeleyWriter, CombinedReader, CombinedWriter, JCloudsReader, JCloudsWriter

    public interface IBackendReader
    Interface for reading the stored buckets in every backend.
    Author:
    Sebastian Graf, University of Konstanz

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void close()
      Closing the storage.
      IBucket read(long pKey)
      Getting a reference for the given pointer.
      UberBucket readUber()
      Reading the UberBucket

             throws TTIOException
        Getting a reference for the given pointer.
        Parameters:

        Returns:

        Throws:
        TTException - if something bad happens during read
